moves_list.name: Always Get Your Man
moves_list.description:
When you follow the trail of someone you know is guilty of a Hangin' Crime, roll + Savvy.  On a 10+, you will inexorably track them to their destination, and choose one: 
•You catch them on even footing. 
•You catch up to them before they reach their destination. 
•You beat them to their destination, and can prepare for their arrival. On a 7-9, you track them to their destination, but the Marshall chooses one: 
•When you catch up to them, they have the advantage. 
•The journey is long and arduous. 
•To catch them, you have to ride ahead of your companions.

moves_list.name: Hunchin'
moves_list.description: When you Open Your Mystic Senses roll + Savvy instead of + Strange.

moves_list.name: Judge of the Guilty
moves_list.description:
When you Size Up a Person, you have two extra questions you can ask: 
•Have you committed any Hangin' Crimes in the last year? 
•Have you ever committed (name a particular Hangin' Crime)?

moves_list.name: Justice Comes From the Barrel of a Gun
moves_list.description: You do +1 Harm to those you know are guilty of a Hangin' Crime, and you get +1 Armor against their attacks.

moves_list.name: Rally the Townsfolk
moves_list.description: When you speak to a mob about a threat that concerns their livelihood, roll + Charm.  On a hit, they unite and will fight for you as a gang (2 harm, 0-armor, Vulnerable: Desertion, size as appropriate).  On a 10+, add +1 harm, +1 armor to the gang, or lose Vulnerable. On a miss, congrats, you're the scapegoat.

moves_list.name: That's a Hangin' Crime in My Book
moves_list.description: Name another crime.  Add it to the list of crimes that count as Hangin' Crimes.

moves_list.name: Welcome Reputation
moves_list.description: When you enter a community with your badge of office revealed, roll + Charm. On a hit, they welcome you into the community, and tell you their sorrows.  On a 10+, you take +1 forward for dealing with members of the community.  On a miss, they don't trust you, and are resentful of your presence.

custom.name: Hangin' Crimes
custom.description: A number of Law Dog moves refer to Hangin' Crimes: Crimes normally punishable by hangin' throughout the west.  The Hangin' Crimes are: murder, arson, grand theft, cattle theft, horse theft, rape, and witchcraft.

moves_list.name: Animal Friend
moves_list.description: When you Size Up an Animal, roll + Savvy.  On a hit, you may ask questions as if you had used the Size Up a Person move on them.

moves_list.name: Born on Horseback
moves_list.description: In a Fight, spend 1 more than you normally would as long as you're on Horseback.

moves_list.name: Horse Sense
moves_list.description: When you are alone with your Horse and wonder what your best course of action is, gain Insight.

moves_list.name: Live off the Land
moves_list.description: When you make the Downtime move, if you've spent considerable time in the wilderness, roll + Savvy.  On a hit, you find enough food to cover basic living expenses.  If your living expenses are already zero, gain one Dinero. On a 10+, either gain 1 Dinero, or find enough food to cover basic living expenses for another person.

moves_list.name: The Quick and the Dead
moves_list.description: When you Attack Someone, or make a Fight move that depends on Grit, roll Quick instead.

moves_list.name: Trackin'
moves_list.description:
When you read tracks, roll + Savvy.  On a hit, ask 2 questions.  On a 10+, ask 3. 
•What happened here? 
•Who did these tracks belong to? 
•Where did they go? 
•Where did they come from? 
•What were they doing?

moves_list.name: Wander the Wastes
moves_list.description:
When you travel into the wilderness, roll + Strange.  On a hit, you travel to any named location you've ever heard of. On a 10+, pick 4.  On a 7-9, pick 2. 
•Name a place; if it exists, you travel there. 
•The journey takes you twice as fast as you normally would. 
•The journey takes a single day, no matter how far or improbable. (Counts as 3 choices) 
•You can lead other people there (1 per person). 
•You arrive in an advantageous position, take +1 forward.
